comment.body: I wonder if it could have anything to deal with the movie taking place in 1917.
@Moor: Sounds like a fitting name for a game, where you fly into buildings. As a game I don't see what could be insidious about it. Lots of games have you kill characters, and nobody bats an eye.
Forgive me for being an idiot but what is usually 1917 associated with? Outside of the USA entering WWI.

@Moor: Well I doubt the CIA had anything to do with my not knowing about something that happened in Russia. I'd blame my history text books for not covering that, or maybe my younger self for not caring about something that didn't interest me.
Thanks for the reply though. :)
